news_header: Two private jets collided at Scottsdale Airport, Arizona, resulting in one death and several injuries.
news_original_title: US: Private jet collision in Scottsdale, Arizona, kills 1
news_text: On Monday, two private jets collided on the runway of Scottsdale Airport in Arizona, leading to at least one fatality and multiple injuries. A Learjet 35A veered off the runway after landing and crashed into a Gulfstream 200 business jet. Four people were reported injured, with two taken to trauma centers. The FAA is investigating the cause of the crash and has temporarily paused flights into the airport.
